personal.name: Gian Figueiredo
personal.description:
I am a person who can adapt myself, so I am always trying to learn new things. 
Now I am focusing on learning web techs like Angular, VueJS and ReactJS. 
I have basic knowledge of Brazil fiscal accessory obligations, basic knowledge of the Oil and Gas industry, like oil geology, well classification and more.

education.description: Software development with Lua, python. Algorithm optimization.

Developing, and managing software lifecycle.
RUP, XP and SCRUM Methodologies.
Object-oriented programming and modelling on UML.
Project patterns such as SOLID, GRASP and Domain Driven Design.
Specialization focused on .NET technologies, such as C#, Xamarin, Azure, and more.

Software development with Java, PHP.
Object oriented programming.

workExperience.jobDescription:
Developing .NET Framework applications with WinForms.
I've started using Subversion as the main code versioning tool, and later helped migrate codebase to git.
More precisely, I act as a developer in a decision support system for the Oil and Gas industry, where the main focus is to optimize the allocation of Offshore Drilling Rigs and PLSV (Pipe-laying ships) to deep water exploration camps.

Developing new solutions, bug fixes, and documentation at Petrobras.
Verifying the process of transporting modifications from development environment to production environment.
SAP NetWeaver Portal Management and ABAP application development.
SAPUI5 application development with OData Service access.
